ConceptDef.label: MO: Tanning leather
ConceptDef.helpText: Hides will need to be processed before they can be used.\nUse a tanning rack to create leather.\nA drying rack can be used to create weaker rawhide.

ConceptDef.label: MO: Lumber
ConceptDef.helpText: Logs will need to be cut into planks before they can be used for more complex uses.\nA trestle can be used to cut logs into planks.

ConceptDef.label: MO: Explorer's Table
ConceptDef.helpText: Explorer's Table can used to find quest locations by using torn notes as fuel.\nThe more objects linked to the table the higher level of locations can be searched for.

ConceptDef.label: MO: Schematics
ConceptDef.helpText: Some research require schematics placed inside a bookshelf to start research.\nSchematics can be found in quest locations from explorer's table or very rarely from traders.

ConceptDef.label: MO: Regeneration
ConceptDef.helpText: Some monsters have a fast healing factor called "regeneration".\nRegeneration can be turned off with the use of fire.
